description:
The Nokia 6110 smartphone was launched with three games included:

  • Logic
  • Memory
  • Snake

Logic involves working out combinations of symbols and memory which requires you to match up pairs of symbols that are hidden beneath cards within the least number of moves.

Memory requires you to match up pairs of symbols that are hidden beneath cards within the least number moves.

For Snake this is the first implementation of the classic game for the Nokia smartphones. It supports a two-player mode using two phones and an infrared connection. The game keeps track of the score and shows in the top left corner. The screen consists of 48 x 84 black and white pixels. The original gameplay design was slightly tweaked so that when the snake reaches the edge of the screen, a tiny delay is added before the crash so that the player has a few more milliseconds to react and save the snake.
title: Nokia 6110 (included games)
